description: The Core i5 processor has three, four, or six megabytes of cache and is available at several speeds ranging from 1.90 GHz to 3.80 GHz. Depending on the motherboard, it uses the LGA 1150 or LGA 1155 socket. Four cores make up the quad-core configuration of Core i5 processors.

The AMD Ryzen 7 5800X processor offers eight cores and sixteen threads, making it a powerful CPU for high-performance tasks. It comes with a base clock of 3.8 GHz and can boost up to 4.7 GHz with Precision Boost.
The AMD Ryzen 9 5900X is a powerful processor with 12 cores and 24 threads. It offers high performance for gaming and productivity tasks.

The Intel Core i7-11700K is an 11th Gen processor with 8 cores and 16 threads. It operates at a base frequency of 3.6 GHz and can reach up to 5.0 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost. The processor is compatible with LGA 1200 motherboards.

productName: ASUS ROG Strix Z590-E Gaming Motherboard
description: The ASUS ROG Strix Z590-E Gaming is a high-end motherboard designed for Intel 10th and 11th Gen processors. It features robust power delivery, PCIe 4.0 support, and extensive connectivity options. The motherboard also comes with built-in Wi-Fi 6 and 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet.

The GIGABYTE X570 AORUS Elite is a mid-range motherboard for AMD Ryzen processors. It offers PCIe 4.0 support, robust power delivery, and ample connectivity options. The motherboard includes dual M.2 slots for high-speed storage and supports up to 128GB of DDR4 memory.

The MSI MAG B550 TOMAHAWK is a reliable motherboard designed for AMD Ryzen processors. It supports PCIe 4.0, comes with robust VRM cooling, and features extensive USB and storage options. The motherboard is equipped with Realtek 2.5 Gigabit LAN and audio boost technology.

reviews.name: James Smith
reviews.review: Perfect for small form factor builds.

description: The ASRock B560M-ITX/ac is a compact Mini ITX motherboard designed for Intel 10th and 11th Gen processors. It offers PCIe 4.0 support, built-in Wi-Fi 6, and robust power delivery for its size. The motherboard is ideal for small form factor builds and HTPC setups.

The Corsair Vengeance LPX is a high-performance 16GB DDR4 RAM kit. It offers fast and reliable memory for your gaming and productivity needs. The RAM is designed for overclocking and provides excellent heat dissipation.

productName: G.Skill Trident Z RGB 32GB DDR4 RAM
description: The G.Skill Trident Z RGB is a stunning 32GB DDR4 RAM kit featuring mesmerizing RGB lighting effects. It provides excellent performance and stability for gaming, content creation, and more. The RAM is optimized for the latest Intel and AMD platforms.

The Crucial Ballistix is a reliable 8GB DDR4 RAM module that offers solid performance for everyday computing tasks. It's an excellent choice for budget-conscious users who need a boost in their system's memory capacity.

The Dell UltraSharp U2719D is a 27-inch monitor with QHD resolution, providing crisp and vibrant colors. It's perfect for professionals and content creators who require accurate color representation and excellent viewing angles.

productName: ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q 27-Inch Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q is a 27-inch gaming monitor with a high refresh rate of 165Hz and G-Sync technology, providing a smooth and responsive gaming experience. Its IPS panel ensures accurate colors and wide viewing angles.

reviews.name: Liam Baker
reviews.review: Immersive gaming with the curved display.

reviews.name: Luna Peterson
reviews.review: Fast response time for competitive gaming.

reviews.name: Max Reed
reviews.review: Vibrant colors and wide viewing angles.

description: The ViewSonic VX2458-C-MHD is a 24-inch curved gaming monitor, offering an immersive experience with its curved display. With a fast response time and vibrant colors, it's perfect for competitive gaming and multimedia consumption.

reviews.name: Oliver Turner
reviews.review: Multitasking made easy with ultrawide display.

reviews.name: Grace Allen
reviews.review: Great for productivity and content creation.

description: The LG 34WN80C-B is a 34-inch ultrawide monitor, providing ample screen space for multitasking and productivity. With its IPS panel and excellent color accuracy, it's also a fantastic choice for content creators and offers an immersive gaming experience.

The SanDisk Extreme is a 1TB portable SSD offering fast and reliable storage in a compact form factor. With its rugged design, it's ideal for on-the-go media professionals and anyone who needs high-speed portable storage.

productName: Western Digital WD Red 6TB NAS Hard Drive
description: The Western Digital WD Red is a 6TB NAS hard drive designed for network-attached storage systems. It offers reliable storage for backups and data sharing, with low noise and power consumption for 24/7 operation.

The Samsung 970 EVO Plus is a high-performance 500GB NVMe SSD with blazing fast read and write speeds. It offers reliability and durability, making it an excellent choice for gaming, multimedia editing, and intensive workloads.

reviews.name: Grace Parker
reviews.review: Modular cables make cable management easy.

description: The Corsair RM750x is a 750W power supply with 80+ Gold efficiency, ensuring stable and efficient power delivery. Its modular cables help in easy cable management, making it a popular choice for clean and tidy builds.

productName: EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G3 850W 80+ Gold Power Supply

reviews.name: Max Reed
reviews.review: Quiet operation even under heavy load.

description: The EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G3 is an 850W power supply with 80+ Gold efficiency, providing rock-solid performance for high-end systems. Its quiet operation and reliable power delivery make it a top choice among enthusiasts.

productName: Seasonic Focus GX-650 650W 80+ Gold Power Supply

reviews.name: Liam Baker
reviews.review: Efficient and stable for gaming rigs.

reviews.name: Nora Allen
reviews.review: Compact size perfect for small cases.

description: The Seasonic Focus GX-650 is a 650W power supply with 80+ Gold efficiency, offering efficient and stable power for gaming rigs. Its compact size makes it a great choice for small form factor cases without compromising on quality.

productName: Logitech G502 HERO High-Performance Gaming Mouse

reviews.name: Lucas Turner
reviews.review: Comfortable grip for long gaming sessions.

description: The Logitech G502 HERO is a high-performance gaming mouse featuring an accurate and responsive sensor. It comes with customizable buttons and a comfortable grip, making it a top choice for gaming enthusiasts.

productName: Razer DeathAdder V2 Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: The Razer DeathAdder V2 Pro is a wireless gaming mouse known for its seamless wireless performance. With its ergonomic design and precise tracking, it's perfect for extended gaming sessions.

productName: Corsair K70 RGB MK.2 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard

reviews.name: Lucas Turner
reviews.review: Comfortable wrist rest for extended typing.

description: The Corsair K70 RGB MK.2 is a mechanical gaming keyboard featuring responsive and durable mechanical keys. With customizable RGB lighting effects and a comfortable wrist rest, it's designed for both gaming and productivity.

productName: Logitech G915 Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Keyboard
description: The Logitech G915 Lightspeed is a wireless gaming keyboard known for its lag-free performance. With low-profile keys and a premium build quality, it offers a smooth typing experience and adds a touch of sophistication to your setup.

key_features.switch_type: Mechanical (GL Tactile, GL Linear, or GL Clicky)
